website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the Angel Line but doesn't offer better quality or price. We recommend the Angel Line if a budget price is your top concern.
pros: Constructed of micro-fiber upholstery that is easy to clean
cons: Consumers found that though it is almost twice the price of our best value pick, it isn't more comfortable

customer_reviews.title: We were pretty excited about this chair when we ordered it
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty excited about this chair when we ordered it, but were very disappointed once we actually put it together and sat in it. The cushions are extremely uncomfortable and cheap. They remind me of the thin foam cushions on inexpensive lawn furniture. Unless you plan on ordering new cushions I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Corry

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was expecting, but still happy
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made. The bottom cushion is little too firm, but over time will probably soften up. The cushion material seems more like what outdoor cushions are made of. I was expecting a little softer fabric. But this will probably be easier to keep clean. Also- I ordered espresso- which is normally a darker color than the wood I received.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the wallet, meets our needs and exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: We sat in 2 dozen different rockers at Buy Buy Baby and furniture stores. The really high quality rockers were $650 - $1800. The lower end rockers were all very similar to this one except + $150. This set is comfortable, glides easy and quietly. Not a family heirloom, for the nursery in my opinion it is the best deal going.
customer_reviews.author: Husband, Dad and Fixer.

customer_reviews.title: Arm rest broke in less than 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Both the arm rests came apart in just over 3 months of LIGHT use! The two dowels at each arm came out and 1 broke. Each arm has 1 pocket hole screw that should help to hold the arm but the screw was too short and didn't reach the wood it was supposed to be secured to. Very disappointed. I tried wood glue with large wooden clamps, but the overall feel of the chair is shaky at best and makes us nervous to hold our baby knowing the arm may give out at any second
customer_reviews.author: Housttx

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but was extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but was extremely uncomfortable. We had missing parts for the ottoman and the material was fairly cheap. I would definitely go with a more expensive yet quality chair if you're going to be in it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: sunchik

customer_reviews.title: Product had beautiful appearance. Putting it together was very easy with ...
customer_reviews.text: Product had beautiful appearance. Putting it together was very easy with tool needed included. Product came with a small damage. As per the instruction they request you not return the whole chair just request a replacement for the damage piece, so I will be doing that. The damage has no effect on how the chair works or it's stability. The rocking motion work great with no noises herd. My wife which the most important part.
customer_reviews.author: rodrigo loza

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years In - Completely Broken
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 2 years in and the chair has broken in too many places that it isn't worth fixing. Worked great for the first year or so but it started to loosen up during the second year. The arm rails have detached from the front supports twice now. Also, I have reinforced the back of the chair once but it has now broken beyond reassonable repair. We honestly didn't expect a extremely long life out of a less expensive chair - but I would have expected longer than two years. My reccomendation would be to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tilley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of the price. Went through 3 of these. The company kept sending replacements, but we just wanted our money back. They squeak like crazy until they fall apart. Tried to glue the first two back together after the arm rest screws broke off from normal use. After the 3rd one fell apart, I drove screws through the front of the arm rests, and now the backrest is falling apart and making noise. We just gave up on replacements. We've gone through 3 of these in 18 months. In the process of finding another from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: ryan tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but was so uncomfortable to sit in
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a nursing mother I'm an old lady who just loves the feel of a glider to sit and knit in. This chair was easy to assemble and it looks nice but it has to be the most uncomfortable chair I have sat in. I realize it had a 30 return but I would have had to take it apart and try to fit all the pieces back in the original boxes so I opted to donate so maybe a young mother could use it and a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan in WA

customer_reviews.title: 5 months later, still great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for 5-6 months now and it still seems new. I actually like the little pillow it comes with, despite some negative reviews about it. I got this and a dutalier to compare, and honestly the differences between them are nothing huge. I kept this one because it was so much more value for the money. No creaking yet or anything, but then again I'm 125 lbs so I probably don't wear it out as much as someone bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: This was not a good purchase for us
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good purchase for us. I purchased it in January 2016 because my daughter wanted to have her nursery finished before the baby was born in April. It was not used until after the baby arrived in April. One year later it started to fall apart. The arm came loose and then the whole back came apart from the rest of the chair. Luckily no one was injured. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for price! Works great for breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical and hesitant to purchase this chair after reading mixed reviews. Some people liked it, but some said it came damaged and was very cheap. Well, I purchased it anyway because I was desperate for something to breastfeed my new infant in and couldn't afford more than its price. I ended up being VERY HAPPY with this glider! It shipped to me in perfect condition, was easy to put together, and was very comfortable. I've been using it now for almost two months and it has held up nice. I would definitely recommend...for the price, it's a very nice looking and comfortable glider.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Developed annoying squeak - had to return
customer_reviews.text: Update: squeaking got worse, had to return, this is simply not usable with the constant squeak. Very disappointing and frustrating as I still need a good rocking chair for my newborn. I loved this up until a week and a half after I started using it when it developed an annoying squeak when I rock in the chair. This is incredibly frustrating as I’m trying to rock my fussy newborn to sleep but it’s too much of a hassle to go out of my way to return this product. The chair itself is so comfortable and it was just what I needed but this squeaking is just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Dgd

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really uncomfortable! I ache all over after sitting in this chair for even half an hour. The bottom cushion is like a rock and the back cushion is impossible to lean back into. Maybe it's made for a taller person or someone who has their own padding, I don't know. I am average height and weight. The footstool is not adjustable. The lumbar pillow is useless. It's easy enough to put together, which I"m happy about since I will be taking it apart and returning it. It arrived with all parts and undamaged. The price is right, but I guess you get what you pay for. I thought a glider was a glider, but they aren't all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Waku Waku

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH!
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE HAD THIS FOR A YEAR AND A HALF. WE HAVE BEEN USING IT FOR ONE YEAR, EVERY NIGHT, SO LESS THEN 400 USES. IT FELL APART INTO PIECES. FIRST THE ARM REST FELL APART AND I FIXED THAT. 3 WEEKS LATER THE BACK BROKE AND THE BOTTOM CRACKED. I REGRET THAT WE EVER BOUGHT THIS PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair when delivered. Comfortable to use. BUT after 10 times of sitting in it the chair cushion wore out. We flipped it over and in 3 days the other side did the same thing. We are all short, light weight people. This fabric is just as thin as it gets. SO FRUSTRATING when you have a newborn and have to deal with this extra headache! Don't BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. I cannot find a comfortable position to nurse my little guy. I get horrible low back pain after a nursing session, especially if I doze off. The neck/head area is uncomfortable too. It's also pretty narrow so now that my baby is closer to 1 year old he's either hitting his head on the arms or his feet hang way over the side so he's kicking things off of the side table. The other issue have with this chair is that the arm cushions slide down so they're not provided cushion over the arm rests. They need at least daily readjustments just to slip off after the next feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair with our first child. It was really easy to put together and is still holding together after a few years of use. It rocks well when trying to get kids to fall asleep however it isn’t necessarily the most comfortable chair ever. The cushions are a little thin and compared to more expensive chairs, it can get uncomfortable after sitting for long periods. For the price, it works really well for rocking as long as you don’t mind sacrificing some comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jlrrx2206

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's nursery and have had it for about 9 months. Overall, it's a good value. I did purchase a cushion for the seat after about a week, as the seat is a pretty cheap piece of foam and my daughter was nursing for 45 minutes at a time. After about 4 months, the foam on the arms started to flatten a bit and that's gotten a bit worse, but I don't mind it. I love the lumbar support pillow! It helps a lot. I currently spend about an hour a day in this chair (spread out throughout the day) and it's still quite functional for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great glider with so-so fabric
customer_reviews.text: The glider is sturdy and good size-slightly wider than some others, so fits my 5-3 size 14 frame and works for my 6~3 husband. Assembly was super easy; it came with the ottoman and the whole chair bottom put together. Rocks quietly and very comfy. The padded arms and lumbar pillow are excellent addictions. With 2 little ones, we have spent hours in it every day. I got the beige fabric and am disappointed in the quality. It looks and feels cheap, especially on the ottoman, and the cushioning on the ottoman and in the pillow are not very good. I expect to have to recover the pads and ottoman in a relatively short time.
customer_reviews.author: JShleg

customer_reviews.title: price and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got my rocker yesterday, well, I say my because i pay for it, but is actually my wife's, it took very little to put it together, most parts are already assembled, all you need to do is the back, arms rest and padding, 8 simple screws, and you're ready to go, is very comfortable, I will recommend it anytime, if something goes south down the road, I will update my review, but for now, is 5 ***** all the way around .
customer_reviews.author: DJ KARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this chair
customer_reviews.text: I and my daughter was extremely dissatisfied with this product. I would give it negative stars if possible. It was missing pieces the cushions are cheap along with the whole chair. My daughter just had her baby and is to tired to deal with dismantling it and returning it. I will go and get her a different and better chair that I can see and try. Don’t waste your time and money on this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Not happy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a great glider. The prices can really range and with this being our first baby I wanted to make sure I got some thing that was comfortable and sturdy. my husband —who hates to put together anything— put this together quickly and easily. The chair is so comfortable I rocked myself to sleep in it last night lol I would definitely recommend! A great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: lindsey fry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is alright, better than nothing I guess. The foam on the arms don’t go around the wood, so it is constantly compressing down the side of the chair. Also the cushions are going flat already. I definitely wouldn’t buy it again and honestly wish I could still return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Even though it looks great, I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You would think this would last longer than 6 months. Even though it looks great, I am so disappointed. I bought it for my daughter for her first baby and hope to not have to buy her another for another baby. It is now permanently in a lean back position that can't be fixed. It creaks so loud when you rock. I contacted the company and they say they are sorry but can't do anything about it since it's been past the 30 days. I would not buy another one from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Barb B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: This glider, unfortunately, I bought as a gift. Will have to get one of my own, so very comfortable, everything is washable on the glider (not the foot stool), there are pockets on the armrests and the lower back pillow is a bonus!! Great product, glad I was able to give it to my daughter for my grand child's room!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is cheaply made. The cushions are really thin the fabric is cheap and the sewing is a joke. The cushions had a chemical smell. The “support” pillow was lopsided. Don’t let the pictures fool you. The cushions on the arms eventually slide down ( I’ve had mine for 6 months) leaving your arms/elbows to rest on just wood (ouch) with the cheap fabric over it. Honestly, it’s worth the extra coin to get a different chair that’s higher quality. You will spend countless hours rocking and feeding your baby, better make sure you both are gonna be comfortable. Get a different chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Rees

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembily
customer_reviews.text: This chair was extremely easy to put together, it only took a couple minutes. It is very comfy and glides great. Came on time and in perfect condition. This was a great addition to my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glider for my newborn about 1.5 years ago. It was easy to put together and comfortable and worked great until about 6 months ago. Slowly the chair started making creaking noises and I tried to tighten the screws to see if that would help. Then the front wood pieces of the arm rests fell off and the back of the chair completely broke off mid rocking as well. All we used it for was rocking our son for a few minutes at night. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, durable, 1+ year of use
customer_reviews.text: I love this glider. I’ve had it for just over a year now and I use it multiple times a day. Other reviews mention the cushion on the arms, and it is thin and not the most comfortable. I use a pillow to lean towards one side and use that as my cushion for my arms. I’ve nursed in this glider and also cuddled my son on this glider. I’m 5’4 about 170# and I fit very comfortably. My 6’ 200# husband also fits comfortably in this. I haven’t had a problem with it creaking or anything like that. It still glides just as nicely as when I first got it. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: very comforable chair
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough good about this glider. Its range of motion is excellent and it glides smoothly. My only knock would be I wish the quality of the fabric was better .. it feels to plastic to me. I put a cotton quilted chair cover on it. I would buy again thou because it is so comfortable and well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: I was determined to find the perfect glider. I researched and researched
customer_reviews.text: I was determined to find the perfect glider. I researched and researched; I sat and sat; yet nothing seemed quite right. I became so overwhelmed in the selection process, I asked for referrals from friends and was given this particular glider. It was comfortable enough, I guess, but wasn't that impressive from the start. It has now been two years and the padding is seriously flattened out and is quite uncomfortable. I also thought we needed the ottoman, be we actually rarely ever used it. As far as the frame is concerned, it creaks and seems a bit on the fragile side after two years of use. I'm definitely not impressed on how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: tenesa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Save more and spend it on a better chair/company. The fabric was pulling the same day we received it. Felt and looked cheap (I mean it was... but not even worth what it’s listed as)
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son and daughter-in law as a baby shower gift. I was a little skeptical purchasing a chair without sitting in it but they picked this out and I was pleasantly surprised. This chair is very well made and very comfortable. Definitely a great value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order this chair this is my second chair and it’s so wobbly every time I sit and rock my baby I feel like it will fall apart and it’s so squickie. I wish I never ordered it I was so excite to get it it looks really pretty but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Moves and creaks
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's a decent buy for the money, but the loud creaking from the padding rubbing against the frame drives me nuts! The chair is very compact - I like to sit on top of my leg and there's no room to do that. Also, it's very light-weight, so the chair moves ever time i get up or sit down, I have marks all over my wall from getting up off the chair and it swinging back and hitting it. I have to move it up a few feet every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in that
customer_reviews.text: We are really hoping this chair softens up by the time my baby actually arrives. The cushions are hard as a rock and very uncomfortable right now. The box came destroyed from shipping and caused so scratches on the actual structure on the chair itself, very disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it 6 months and the only problem I had was that the arm rest flattened out. I fixed that by going on line and getting a pair of arm rest pads. It's well built, simple to put together. Very comfortable. The seat cushion is firm and comfortable. I sprayed it with silicone when I got and I haven't had any problems with stains from spilled liquids, Some reviews said that it makes noise but mine is still as quite as the day I got. I use for around 4 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love! Great quality, firm enough for support yet very comfy. Perfect for rocking the baby. The ottoman rocks along as well. Great for a gift, was worried it was cheap. The lumbar pillow is awesome too,
customer_reviews.author: Mozartmama

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair seemed good But after using it only a few times, the arm rest cushions are already falling apart. The snaps on the cushion didn't even last.. I would never buy this product again. I'd invest in a sturdy nursing chair for long term usage. Not this style of a glider.
customer_reviews.author: Babi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! So beautiful and stylish! Update Feb 2018 Pros: Not cheaply designed Beautiful Wonderful color scheme Holds up extremely well even for our move from The Main Land to Hawaii Very comfortable and soft Fairly Easy to put together Does not squeak and I've had this for 2 years now (Moderatly used) Sturdy Cons: The pillow is useless, ive personally never used it (Just a me thing) I wished it reclined (however they never said it would so just a me thing agin)
customer_reviews.author: Sasha  Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair before baby was born. He is almost 6 months now and this chair is used pretty all day every day and has held up so far. The cushions arent as fluffy as they were, just from use, and there are a few creaks here and there, but I didn't expect it to hold out this long with some of the other reviews. I dont expect to last a lifetime but for now its use is great. Was also a god send with a 3rd degree tear. The cushion was soooooo much better to sit on than other things like my bed or pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and quiet
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasnt sure about this chair, the seat seemed extra firm and I was worried it would be uncomfortable. Now that I've had this for a year and use multiple times throughout the day I love it! The back cushion is very plush and comfortable and the extra back cushion is amazing. Glides quietly and smoothly. My very big husband fits in it perfectly and finds it comfortable as well. I would definently buy this rocker again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk - broken after 3 weeks and seller won't accept return or replace
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this glider as an expectant mother in May. Received the item and assembled and it seemed okay. Our daughter was born late June and the chair has been used for approximately three weeks and two springs in the seat are broken. I contacted the seller who refused to accept a return because it wasn't within the 30 day return window. How, as an expectant parent, can you purchase an item to complete a nursery and then not be allowed to return it when it breaks? I had no use for the glider while still pregnant and it hasn't been used for 30 days and it's broken. Obviously poorly manufactured and not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have babies that like being rocked !
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate the assembly because I bought it for a friend & didn’t ask. But according to her feedback, Her babies love to be rocked to sleep, and she said that he has been very much helpful and is super comfortable. So in other words, I highly recommend this if your baby is the same. By the way, she has twins.
customer_reviews.author: Bre'Andrea Jones

customer_reviews.title: Mold was found
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. I didn't know when I ordered but it has patterns. Down thing was out of the box, the leg parts had mold, see picture. Baby essential and mold??? don't go together. I just wiped them with clorox wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable Glider
customer_reviews.text: This glider isn't on the upscale level of some, but for the money, it is comfortable and does the job. It was easy to put together. It took me about 10 minutes by myself and all necessary tools were included. My one negative review is that the paint is easily transferable to other hard surfaces of you are to accidentally bump something or slide it. I have ceramic flooring in the room that it is in and I just lightly nudged it when cleaning. The paint scraped off onto my floor. With a little elbow grease, it came right up. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Fabric torn within a few months after use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glider for my daughter when her baby was two months old. This is her first baby. There are no other children or pets in the house. My daughter is tiny (5'6" 115 pounds). She only uses the glider in the middle of the night. Within a few months of use, the fabric on the seat cushion and ottoman tore. Although she is happy with the chair as far as comfort, I'm very unhappy with the quality of fabric. With gentle limited use (she works outside of her home), the fabric should not have torn in my opinion. Because I live out of state, I just discovered this recently otherwise I would have attempted a return.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Kettner

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 Years Later!
customer_reviews.text: We got this right before our son arrived and it has been functioning perfectly since we got it 2.5 years ago. We use this chair literally every single day at least twice a day when we read stories before nap/bedtime, and before that while I was breastfeeding. It functions perfectly with no squeaks or flaws. The fabric is a little tough to clean as it's not removable / machine washable but we've taken good care of it. I am 5'7 and 135 pounds, my husband is 5'10 and 190 pounds. We are both very comfortable in it!
customer_reviews.author: NZiki

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good chair
customer_reviews.text: Received as a baby shower gift. Looks great, material feels a little cheap but it’s fine. The ottoman seems a little rickety, chair is in baby room for nursing and the ottoman will probably be moved to the attic way before the chair for fear of breaking. Overall pretty please with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you’re hesitant, just buy it. Local furniture store selling a higher quality set (just a squishier pad) for 3x the price so I decided to settle on this cheaper alternative as it’s only going to be used as a nursery item for so long. Well worth it the price. The pad isn’t as comfortable as the *furniture store* option but can easily be replaced when the time comes. I’m glad I got this chair and saved my self the extra money for other things I need for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah VanderWeele

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a beat-up box, all the wood parts were dusty and dirty. (wet cloth to clean) Not well designed so it appears to be very weak and easily broken. Only 2 spokes to hold the arms on, only 2 snaps top and bottom to hold the padding on the arm, and cheap ties to hold the seat cushion on. I put the value at $79.00. and don't expect it to last a year in a house with no kids. (My best 67 year old opinion... )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.text: I did not even have the chair three months and when you sit in the chair it goes back to far if you don’t put the chair where it hits the wall you’re going to go down I put it in a spare bedroom where no one sits in the chair because it cannot be used cheaply made .
customer_reviews.author: bruce b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair. Very easy to assemble as the base for both the chair and the foot rest are already pre-assembled. All you have to do is screw in the back and arms and the cushions connect with buttons on the base. Took me less than 15 minutes to fully assemble and is very comfortable. Most chairs as nice as this in stores are marked as $300.00+.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The price is pretty unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glider 3 years ago for baby #1. The price is unbeatable, and it looked similar to other, pricier gliders. After 3 years of daily use, the cushion is now worn out/thinned, and it was becoming uncomfortable to sit on it so we had to upgrade to something else (for baby #2). It did, however, served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LeOtter’sMumC

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Our first one came with a piece of wood completely split. We contacted the seller and they sent us all new parts for the chair. When piecing the parta together, there are some dings and marks, but we were okay with that. It is not a top notch quality, but we didn't pay for that. We've had it for a few months and it does not show any wear and tear yet and does not squeak at all. We would suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Modern look Custom Glider and Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around and very happy we picked this Tuscany Custom Glider and Ottoman with Free Lumbar Pillow, Black/Grey, Cleanable Upholstered. Price and quality is excellent and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: The glider glides easily and is very comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in a timely fashion. Even though the box was torn in several places during shipping, the item was not damaged. It took two of us about 35-40 minutes to assemble the glider and ottoman....not hard at all! All the parts were there and all the holes lined up perfectly. The grey color depicted in the photo is exactly the color of this very soft material. The glider glides easily and is very comfortable too.....just as comfortable as a higher priced one that I have used before. Please note: This glider and ottoman are NOT cream or off-white. It is a true white color. That information is important if you are matching it to other nursery furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Not just for new mothers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Mom is 93 years old and just loves her new rocker!!! Assembly was somewhat difficult as the nuts and bolts are in a confined space, but with a few egads, and oh goshes, I got it together. When first unpacking, I thought we were missing the screws and nuts - called the company (and they answered promptly) and as I was talking, found them taped to the outside of the box. Very delighted with our new piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly/decent comfort, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years and then completely broke. Easy assembly, but arm rest started pulling apart after about a year and then piece of wood holding the back to the seat base split when my husband (+ 2 yr old) sat in it one day. Used maybe 20 min a day for not quite 2 years... was hoping to get some more time out of it. Comfort was pretty good before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: LKat

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: When my husband was putting this chair together for our nursery, I thought it was going to be too short. After is was built and placed in the nursery I realized that it was actually just right for me. I sit in this chair with my baby often and we love it! It is very comfortable and rocks very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves it. I was able to get it in black with gray cushions which was exactly the colors she wanted. I saw a lot of reviews about the rocker coming damaged. I did not have that problem. Received a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Manalla Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's junk. One of the front bearings sheared off ...
customer_reviews.text: It's junk. One of the front bearings sheared off after a few months, rendering the chair unusable. I tried to order a new bearing from the company's website, but to do so you're REQUIRED to answer about 20 questions including the country of manufacture, date of manufacture (including day, month and year), date of purchase (including day, month and year), product part name, and product part code. If you don't have all this information, you can't order a part. Needless to say, the chair's going into the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together... I did it while 9 months pregnant! And I like it... my husband and I are pretty tall so we can't really lean our heads back all the way but it is tall enough that it's comfortable at 3AM while rocking baby back to sleep. And I didn't think I'd really care about the Ottoman, but I love putting my feet up to rock my baby! Still using it nightly after 9 months and no issues! Lumbar pillow is kinda useless, but I didn't buy this for a pillow anyway
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of very bad reviews so I was thinking bad, but fortunately it is great. The assembly was perfect. The comfort is great. Everything was great. I would definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Puts the baby straight to sleep
customer_reviews.text: My 1 mo will be crying inconsolably, fighting sleep with all her might, and pass out as soon as I start rocking her in this amazing chair. It is so very comfortable. The pillow ads the perfect back support. It’s so nice to have the glider footrest too. 10/10 highly recommend. Super easy to put together too
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Bieker

customer_reviews.title: The white paint is easily cleaned and is thick enough that it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these gliders with the gray padding and they are well built chairs. We use these in a large daycare setting so they are certainly used for several hours each day. The white paint is easily cleaned and is thick enough that it does not "wear" off with general cleaning and disinfecting. The padding is thick and comfortable and should easily last us a few years before needing replacement. I would expect in a home setting the chair and padding would last many years. The cost of this chair as compared to others is fair and is just as well built as many of the higher priced competitor chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who just had a baby and is using it in the nursrey. She loves it and says it is very comfortable. It came almost assembled it was in like 3 larger pieces that were very easy to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rocking your babe
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new rocker when our baby arrived. I’m 5’2” and my husband is 6’4”, so finding a chair that is comfortable for both of us is close to impossible. We seem to have hit the jackpot. I nurse our daughter in this chair for hours a day, and dad can rock baby girl to sleep and bottle feed comfortably in this chair as well. So glad we found this chair.
customer_reviews.author: SHutch

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall people too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small nursery. My husband is 6'5" and I am 5'7". I was concerned about finding a glider that could accommodate both of us in our small room for an affordable price... I read a lot of reviews about how this product served tall people the best. My husband is approximately 215lbs and the chair strained a bit for the first time of him (or anyone) sitting in it after he assembled it. But after that, the chair doesn't creak anymore and it glides very smoothly. We are very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: HWesley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A lot cheaper than babies r us and the wife loves it. This chair comes in almost any color imaginable and the wife was amazed I matched the nursery set so well. It's a pretty comfortable chair and only took about 15 mins to put together. My box was in excellent conditioning and so were all the pieces. You really can't beat the value of chair. I can't say much about durability just yet but I just needs to last at least a year and I'll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darren N.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not the chair I expected, but after doing all my research I should have known that for $200 I wasn't going to get a solid chair. It was a bit frightening sitting in the chair as it squeaked and popped, and while I may be hefty pregnant my husband and friend certainly are not and also felt uneasy. There isn't much room in the chair which surprised me based off the listed width measurement. It was the sole reason I bought the chair. I wouldn't recommend this chair, and if returning it wasn't such a pain I would.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie P

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for our nursery. We really didn't want to pay a ton for one, and this was a great option. The little lumbar pillow is absolutely useless. The padding is on the thin side, but comfortable enough. I rarely used the chair for nursing, even at night. The stool + chair combo is bulky and awkward to maneuver. And, after a few months of semi-regular use, it creaks/squeaks while using it. But, it was cheap, functional, decent-looking, and it's really a nice investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubea

customer_reviews.title: Literally fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this chair at first and used it a lot. We bought the chair in June and it broke this week (6 months later) I used it fequently to rock my son and always took care of it. I'm a smaller person so it wasn't being pushed to limits or anything. It started squeaking first and WD40 didn't help. The arms separated from the chair body and the the back piece actually cracked. It's unfixable. I'd rather have spent $200+ dollars on a solid wood rocker. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: rachel321

customer_reviews.title: My son is 3 months old and it has been perfect for nursing
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this rocker. My son is 3 months old and it has been perfect for nursing, rocking, and everything. The material is easy to clean ( he had a blowout accident) and it doesn’t squeak. It was also easy to assemble. I’m attatching a photo so you can see that it does have a swirl design I was not expecting. But luckily I liked that detail.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Compton

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking chair
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking chair, we bought for my mother in law for Christmas. But the seat is SUPER uncomfortable it's not squishy or soft it's seriously hard as a rock. It's got good lumbar support though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I use my glider to feed and rock my baby (now 6 weeks old). It's comfortable, affordable, and practical. The fabric is easy to wipe clean. The arm rests are a good height for supporting your arms while holding baby or even resting baby's head on if your arms need a break. The assembly was pretty simple. The gliding motion very effective in soothing baby, and you will definitely want the gliding foot rest too!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Crappy piece of crap never seen a piece of furniture made this bad👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price just expected a little more
customer_reviews.text: Cushion material not as high quality as expected and filling on the arm pads seems thin and like it will break down soon. Chair assembles easy and chair holding up for now but seems like I have to be careful. So far ok still remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Its not as cushiony as I'd like but the pattern is nice and it rocks nicely and quietly. I have had no issues with it at all. It made a nice addition to my room.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: I am a pretty big person
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty big person. 5'7" and 260lbs. I was worried I would not fit in it but it's so comfy. The pillow is really helpful. I have never had another glider to compare to this but for the price I would say it does a really good job. Super easy to assemble at 8 months pregnant I was able to do it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Kamidi

customer_reviews.title: Smooth glide
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the nursery. It is great! It was easy to assemble. It's comfortable but not for long periods, well at least for me. It did develop a sound after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Hileman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars as it started squeaking after 4 months as others have reported. In the chair's defense I am on the upper end of the weight limit so possibly that contributed to the early squeaking. One of the cross bars also splintered early on and I am having to repair that now. I like the brand as we have a stork craft crib and have had no issues, but this wasn't a get a great product at a deal. It was priced according to the quality of the product in my opinion. The old you get what you pay for adage I guess.
customer_reviews.author: blacksheepsigns

customer_reviews.title: Good product for mothers feeding baby or older parents anything to relax.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister in law to feed the baby on. She seems to love the car. I've read some reviews where people said the cushion wasn't good enough. Well they are wrong or overly heavy and over weight where it's not the cushions fault. I've sat in this chair while I was visiting them and I'm 145 lbs. he cushion supported my butt soft yet firmly and the rocker glides smoothly yet now obnoxiously where your moving to fast. It's a great product for the price and need.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had this product almost a year and it's been put through the paces with being over the weight limit and just the other night the front of the right arm broke. Husband is handy so he pulled the broken screw out, used a longer heftier screw and glued it back together. The pad is squished some from lots of rocking it's comfortable-ish for a tall person.
customer_reviews.author: Keta

customer_reviews.title: Typical crap furniture from China
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived with of the bottom dowels broken even though the box was undamaged. Therefore I would assume that it was packed broken. Tried getting replacement parts directly from manufacturer but was informed parts weren't available. Ordered a replacement but taking too long so I will repair the chair myself knowing that it will be done right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Squeak, squeak, squeak, squeak....
customer_reviews.text: Can't stop the squeaking. I tried 3 in 1 oil, wd40, tightening the bolts, loosening the bolts, this thing squeaks like crazy. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this chair is cheap. The fabric is a weird microfiber that feels really gross. After we got the chair all put together we noticed the foot was cracked and there was a huge gouge out of the wood in the front. Every time I tried to call customer service they are closed. It's now been so long that I doubt they will do anything, so I just said forget it. The chair does rock smoothly and fits well into the nursery. But if you're looking for a piece that will last you several years, I would recommend spending a little more and get something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alysen Schollmeyer

customer_reviews.title: ROCK A BYE DEATHTRAP
customer_reviews.text: Dead On Arrival! Still dead after 30 days. The base of the glider came broken rendering the chair unusable. I was told I needed to contact the manufacturer for a replacement part. 30 days later, no replacement sent. The wood is some kind of compressed wood that, in a matter of time, is going to break apart, as already indicated in a number of reviews. No surprise that some of the most recent of reviews are having the same issues with the chairs breaking or arriving broken. Save yourself the trouble, headache, and pending collapse and order another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this chair. I purchased it to go in my baby's nursery. I received it and loved it! However, my excitement was short lived because the ottoman seam ripped after having it for only ONE WEEK. I have tried to get ahold of the manufacturer/seller to get the ottoman replaced and haven't had any luck finding a way to contact them. Really disappointed with the quality.. That is my biggest complaint about it.. It is also not the most comfortable chair, my butt goes numb after rocking my baby in it for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KHavi04

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to assemble. Make sure to inspect before the deliver guys leaves. Don't forget to create Amazon Baby Registry
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to put together that is the positive. At this time the seat cushion is pretty hard, however I think this may soften over time. For the money it is not a bad looking chair. The only thing I wish I did was inspect it before the delivery guy left as it had a quarter size nick in the wood. As the chair is prone to be damage because of the handling of the large box. It only takes a minute to open and verify the wood of the chair is in good shape. We purchase it using Amazon Baby Registry and saved a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far :)
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with how this chair looks. Our nursery is decorated with white furniture and soft pink and gray. I ordered this chair in white with pink material. It looks perfect! Exactly like the picture. There is a slight odor coming from it since we set it up, but it isn't horrible and I'm sure it will go away soon. I was a little nervous to purchase this product based on some reviews, but it seems perfectly fine now. I will continue to update if there are any changes.
customer_reviews.author: melbell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy if you don’t care about the fabric or cushion comfort or how the chair looks. If you just need a cheap chair that rocks then this is the chair for you. Really disappointed in the purchase and going to return ASAP. I trusted all the good reviews but not sure what they are talking about. Gotta be one of my worst purchases this year.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: bottom part of chair that rocks and ottoman come preassembled, so you just have to screw on arm and back rest and button/tie on pads. Padding is really thick so it’s very comfortable, super cute and actually has small white dots even though in pictures it looks solid pink. I thought it was missing hardware, so be sure to look for the bright orange bag attached to the side that’s labeled hardware lol
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have spent more money on a glider but for now this one will do. It’s not a terrible product but it’s also not amazing. The customer service was really great though.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Took about 10 minutes to put together. My wife loves it so far. No creaking noises, glides smoothly and is pretty darn comfy. Seems sturdy and durable as it holds my 200lbs. So far so good. Pleased with this purchase. Update 10/7/2015: It's been nearly 3 months, the baby is here now and we use this glider every day during feedings. So far this thing has still proven to be squeek free and glides great. I would definitely recommend this chair to others in need of a comfortable, sturdy and reasonably priced glider.
customer_reviews.author: David Kazlman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a sturdy and wide rocking chair, I didn't want something flimsy or something that I was squished into towards the end of my pregnancy. This is perfect! Good quality, good cushions, and even the ottoman is very wide to accomodate swollen legs and feet!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this chair. The seat seamed a bit stiff at first but it has gotten better. The back supprt is good and the lumbar support pillow really helps a lot. I like the side pockets and I love the pattern. It glides very smoothly !
customer_reviews.author: perlamar88

customer_reviews.title: No worries with this rocker
customer_reviews.text: We have had this rocker for about 2 weeks. It is used for hours every day. It is comfortable, smooth, quiet. The only problem I foresee is needing to clean the microfiber because it is so light in color. That's not a problem for us, we are used to cleaning fabric with a toddler in the house and now a new baby. For someone who is not to keen on cleaning, I would recommend a different color cushion.
customer_reviews.author: fitzy77

customer_reviews.title: The chair is comfortable, so I hope I don't have anymore problems ...
customer_reviews.text: My chair arrived with a large scratch on the back. Luckily, the back cushion tie covers it. A few days after receiving it one of the snaps that covers the arm came off. The chair is comfortable, so I hope I don't have anymore problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: SciTeach

product_meta.title: Storkcraft Tuscany Custom Glider and Ottoman with Lumbar Pillow, White/Grey
product_meta.description: Color:White/ GrayThe Storkcraft Tuscany Glider and Ottoman gives an instant lift to the decor of your nursery. The Storkcraft Tuscany Glider and Ottoman makes feeding time easy for mother and child while adding a touch of charm to the room. The soft polyester gives a comfortable feel while being durable. With enclosed metal ball-bearings, this wooden glider allows for incredibly smooth rocking. Solid wood construction gives these pieces a sturdy feel that you’ll appreciate far beyond the baby years. With a range of finishes and cushion colors to choose from, it’s easy to coordinate with any nursery.
feature_bullets: Value added: comes with a matching lumbar support pillow. Recommended weight is 250 pounds , Seat Width - 18 inches ,Seat Depth- 20 inches
The back and seat cushions are spot cleanable, keeping the look clean and fresh all year long
Generous seating room, padded polyester blend filled arm cushions and a pocket to store your favourite baby books. Easy to assemble into a beautiful piece of furniture for your nursery
Featuring metal, enclosed ball bearings for a smooth glide motion to help you unwind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,755 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
